content.description:
From below the slab, on the west side of the rock, boulder up the bulge on a fractured inclusion, small knobs, and features to the 1st

bolt

. Continue up the slab on crimps to a large hole and a large reddish block. Climb to the top of the slab and a low angle area with an anchor, or continue to the summit block as for Enchanted Boulder - Route #3.
content.location: Begin at the base of the rock, below the slab. Climb the slab through the large hueco and a large red block.
Middle of the slab at a crescent-shaped dression. 3rd line of bolts from the left.

content.description: From the middle of the slab at the base pull on small cobbles and inclusions to a stance below the first bolt. Continue pulling on small knobs and edges to the cleft between the slab and the cap block. Clip the last bolt and pull the bulge on large cobbles to the anchors.
content.location: Second line of bolts from the left. Middle of the slab, below the summit boulder.

content.description: Scramble up the left side of the cobbled face. Pull knobs and inclusions to the cleft between the lower slab and the cap boulder. Clip the last bolt and pull the bulge on knobs and sketchy feet to the anchor. Due to the steep bulge and the reachy nature of the last move it's difficult to see footholds. A large smooth depression for the left hand marks the former location of a large 60# rounded block that pulled loose and precipitated an upside down, back to the wall leader fall during an early ascent of the route. Caveat Emptor.
content.location: Left side of the Enchanted Boulder slab.
